/>
Introduction
This topic describes the actions to take after issuing notice of a decision on a contested claim, including
action to take if
an unsuccessful claimant fails to respond to the decision notice
, and
the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) is already paying benefits to a party in a contested claim
, and
reducing or discontinuing a running award as a result of a contested claim
.
title: M21-1, Part VI, Subpart iii, Chapter 3, Section C - Authorizing and Notifying Claimants of a Decision on a Contested Claim
citation: Part VI, Subpart iii, Chapter 3, Section C
